issue.title: [CI] Fix C# workflow file syntax
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8322](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8322). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The github actions expression requires the enclosing "$` `"
